title: Dharma Kitchen - Grand Indonesia Mall
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Japanese, Western, Juice bar, Indonesian
description: Dharma Kitchen operates several outlets. This one is a vegetarian restaurant inside a large mall. Serves Indonesian, Japanese, Western and other types of food. Has many kinds of fresh juices.
streetAddress: Jl. M.H. Thamrin 1, Lt. 5 FD 2 Sky Bridge, Grand Indonesia Mall, Jakarta
